content: Billing cycles run monthly from the 1st to the last day of each month. Charges are processed on the first business day following the billing period.
To request a refund, submit a support ticket within 30 days of the charge. Include your transaction ID and reason for the refund request.
Payment methods accepted include major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Payment information can be updated in your account settings.
Late payment fees apply after 15 days past due. A grace period of 7 days is provided before service suspension.
POLICY: Refunds must be approved by billing manager for amounts over $500. Automatic refunds apply for amounts under $100 within 14 days. Never promise immediate refunds without verification.
POLICY: Billing disputes must include transaction ID, date, and amount. Escalate to billing team if customer provides valid dispute documentation. Do not authorize refunds over $1000.
Subscription downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle. Upgrades are immediate with prorated charges. Free trials cannot be extended beyond initial period.
POLICY: Do not provide pricing information for custom enterprise plans. Direct customers to sales team for pricing discussions. Standard plan prices are available on website.
